query_texts: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id WHERE orders.status = 'pending'
SELECT name FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics'
SELECT o.*, c.name FROM orders o LEFT JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.total > 1000
SELECT email FROM users WHERE last_login < '2024-01-01'
SELECT SUM(total) FROM orders WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31' GROUP BY MONTH(created_at)
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id WHERE orders.status = 'completed'
SELECT username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2024-06-01'
SELECT o.*, p.name FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE o.total > 2000
SELECT * FROM products WHERE in_stock = true
SELECT id FROM users WHERE age > 25
